title: RC15 to Be Delayed Further Due to Kiara - Greatandhra
description: Bollywood actress Kiara Advani is currently dating actor Sidharth Malhotra. Recent rumours suggest that she and he will be getting married within the next few weeks.

title: Secret Behind USA Premiere Ticket Sales
description: Veera Simha Reddy and Waltair Veerayya are the films coming up for this Sankranthi. The advance bookings are happening in a big way creating new records all over the USA.

title: Here's how Farhan Akhtar celebrated birthday with Karisma, Amrita - Hindustan Times
description: Farhan Akhtar and sister-in-law Anusha Dandekar had celebrated their birthdays at a get-together last week. They turned a year older on Monday. Here are pics from the party.
